scripts.build: npm run clear-build-directory && npm run copy-static-files && npm run scss && npm run js && npm run js-error
scripts.watch: npm run watch-static-files & npm run watch-scss & npm run watch-js
scripts.test: npm run test-main && npm run test-renderer
scripts.js: babel src/server -d dist/server --verbose && babel src/app -d dist/app --verbose && npm run js-app
scripts.watch-js: babel src/server -d dist/server --watch --verbose & babel src/app -d dist/app --watch --verbose & npm run watch-js-app
scripts.scss: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/main.scss dist/static/css/main.css
scripts.watch-static-files: nodemon -w src -i app/* -i scss/* -e html,css,scss,js,ttf,ico,jpg,png,svg -x "npm run copy-static-files"
scripts.build-native: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js && cd temp && npm install --production && cd .. && electron-builder --dir
scripts.build-native-win: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js win && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --dir --x64 --win nsis zip --publish never
scripts.build-native-mac: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js mac && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --dir --x64 --mac dmg zip --publish never
scripts.build-native-linux: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js linux && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --dir --x64 --linux appImage deb tar.gz --publish never
scripts.publish-native-win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run download-binaries-win && npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js win && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --win --publish always
scripts.publish-native-mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run download-binaries-mac && npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js mac && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --publish always
scripts.publish-native-linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run download-binaries-linux && npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js linux && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --publish always
scripts.pack-native: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js && cd temp && npm install --production && cd .. && electron-builder
scripts.publish-native: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js && cd temp && npm install --production && cd .. && electron-builder --publish always
scripts.download-binaries: npm run download-binaries-win && npm run download-binaries-linux && npm run download-binaries-mac
